item.title: ROS中Dynamxel舵机控制
item.description: ​ 1 拷贝程序文件 cd ~/joey_ws/src git clone https://github.com/arebgun/dynamixel_motor.git 2 编译文件 cd ~/joey_ws catkin_make 3 设置启动驱动launch文件 vim ~/joey_ws/src/dynamixel_motor/dynamixel_tutorials/launch/controller_manager.launch <!-- -*- mode: XML -*- --> <launch> <node name="dynamixel_manager" pkg="dynamixel_controllers" type="controller_manager.py" required="true" output="screen"> <rosparam> namespace: dxl_manager serial_ports: pan_tilt_port: port_name: "/dev/ttyUSB0" baud_rate: 1000000 min_motor_id: 1 max_motor_id: 25 update_rate: 20 </rosparam> </node> </launch> 4 运行驱动检测舵机 连接USB2Dynamixel 运行Dynamixel控制器 USB2Dynamixel连接USB接口，舵机连接USB2DYnamixel接口，舵机外部供电 roslaunch dynamixel_tutorials controller_manager.launch ID 搜索默认从1~25 若查找不到，可以更改controller_manager.launch将ID搜索扩大
